description: Another game bundle is here! This time it's celebrating Women's History Month with the Humble Heroines: Action, Adventure & Intrigue bundle.
title: Check out the Humble Heroines Bundle with A Plague Tale: Innocence, Chorus and more

description: What's not to absolutely love about flying around in a gyrocopter and using its machinegun to blast away rocks and creepy creatures? BORE BLASTERS will absolutely suck away your time.
title: BORE BLASTERS will be your next fixation - out now

description: Inspired by the "Thief" series by Looking Glass Studios, The Dark Mod is a full standalone open source first-person stealth game.
title: Thief tribute game The Dark Mod v2.12 released with big optimizations

description: A recent update to Apex Legends has been causing some havoc on Linux / Steam Deck, but now Valve have released a fresh update to Proton Hotfix to get it working again.
title: Proton Hotfix updated for Apex Legends to work again on Steam Deck / Linux

description: Bay 12 Games / Kitfox Games have announced that the Adventure Mode for Dwarf Fortress will be entering a Beta on April 17th. Anyone who owns it on Steam will be able to test it out!
title: Adventure Mode for Dwarf Fortress enters Beta on April 17

description: One game you should keep an eye on that was briefly covered here recently is An Amazing Wizard, an upcoming action roguelike that looks pretty fun.
title: Metroidvania-inspired action roguelike 'An Amazing Wizard' now on Kickstarter with a demo

description: Another milestone for Valve here, as the Steam Deck has now managed to hit the 14,000 mark for games that are rated either Playable or Verified.
title: Steam Deck hits over 14,000 games rated Playable or Verified

description: EA just surprised launched the Command & Conquer The Ultimate Collection on Steam in a big bundle, along with a few other classic titles.
title: Command & Conquer The Ultimate Collection launched on Steam (and other classics)

description: Batocera.linux is an open-source and completely free retro-gaming distribution, and a new release is now available.
title: Retro-gaming Linux distribution Batocera 39 released
